name: SummaryLayoutItem

fields.name: field
fields.description: The field name reference, relative to the page layout. Must be a standard or custom field that also exists on the detail page.

fields.name: posX
fields.description: The item's column position in the highlights panel grid. Must be within the range of sizeX.

fields.name: posY
fields.description: The item's row position in the highlights panel grid. Must be within the range of sizeY.

fields.name: posZ
fields.description: Reserved for future use. If provided, the setting is not visible to users.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.SummaryLayoutItem.

description: Controls the appearance of an individual field and its column and row
